qas.question: Through what can Link's reaction and mood can be discerned?
Which person has the most spoken dialogue in the game?
Who provided the basis for Midna's voice?
What country does Akiko Komoto come from?
What does Link say when attacking?
What character has the most voice acting?
Who does the voice of Midna?
Through what can Link's verbalizations be discerned?
Which person has the most nods in the game?
Who provided the basis for Zelda's voice?
What country does Zelda come from?
What does Zelda say when attacking?

context: There is very little voice acting in the game, as is the case in most Zelda titles to date. Link remains silent in conversation, but <a4_0><b12_0>grunts<b12_0/><a4_0/> when attacking or injured and gasps when surprised. His emotions and responses are largely indicated visually by <a0_0><a5_0><b8_0>nods and facial expressions<b8_0/><a5_0/><a0_0/>. Other characters have similar language-independent verbalizations, including laughter, surprised or fearful exclamations, and screams. The character of <a1_0><a6_0><b9_0>Midna<b9_0/><a6_0/><a1_0/> has the most voice acting—her on-screen dialog is often accompanied by a babble of pseudo-speech, which was produced by scrambling the phonemes of English phrases[better source needed] sampled by <a3_0><b11_0>Japan<b11_0/><a3_0/>ese voice actress <a2_0><a7_0><b10_0>Akiko Kōmoto<b10_0/><a7_0/><a2_0/>.
